scripts.dev: yarn build:component && yarn build:demo && yarn serve
scripts.copy:files: pwsh -Command "if (!(Test-Path 'dist')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'dist' }; Copy-Item 'index.html' 'dist/' -Force; Copy-Item 'demo.js' 'dist/' -Force; Copy-Item '../web/dist/cookie-consent.js' 'dist/' -Force; if (Test-Path 'scripts') { Copy-Item 'scripts' 'dist/' -Recurse -Force }"
